          <title>
            <string language="en">Thermal conduction in solid and liquid metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thermische Übertragung in den festen und 
flüssigen Metallen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction thermique en métaux pleins et 
liquides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução térmica em metais contínuos e 
líquidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione termica in metalli solidi e liquidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμική διεξαγωγή στα στερεά και υγρά μέταλλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción termal en metales sólidos y 
líquidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows electrons that are free to move around atoms of liquid or solid metals making them good conductors.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conductors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Elektronen, die frei sind, 
um Atome der flüssigen oder festen Metalle zu bewegen, die sie gute 
Leiter bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les électrons qui sont
libres pour se déplacer autour des atomes des métaux liquides ou 
pleins leur faisant de bons conducteurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os elétrons que estão 
livres se mover em torno dos átomos dos metais líquidos ou 
contínuos que fazem lhes condutores bons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli elettroni che 
sono liberi muoversi intorno agli atomi dei metalli liquidi o solidi 
che rendono loro i buoni conduttori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ηλεκτρόνια που είναι 
ελεύθερα να κινηθούν γύρω από τα άτομα των υγρών ή στερεών 
μετάλλων κάνοντας τους τους καλούς αγωγούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los electrones que 
están libres moverse alrededor de los átomos de los metales 
líquidos o sólidos que les hacen los buenos conductores.</string>
          </description>
